title: I need some help knowing how to get to silver and which champs to play
body:
i really want to get to silver rank and i cant get there, i just never seem to be able to have the right champ. i dont know who is good to play in ranked and i need tips on what people in ranked do and how to counter them
please leave comments below :D

replies.body:
1. You have to discover what roles your best (A main role and a backup for when your role is taken, Trust me it will get taken).

2. Once you find the role your good with you need to find a suitable champion for that role (Just like your main role you need to be good with a wide range variety or Champions in case your champion gets banned or doesn't suit well with your team plays).

P.S. A lost of Summoners don't realize this(mainly low elo) but League of Legends is a TEAM GAME and a good working team will win more overall here's a short video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ugXC7g3p0JU .

This video is optional you don't have to watch it nor agree with this comment. I only put this comment here to help you to your journey out of bronze and into silver.
Best of luck on the rift.
